net.proteusframework.email.EmailConfig

    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.email
    Provides a centralized way to handle e-mail templates in Proteus.

    Implementations for EmailConfig and EmailConfigType.

      Subclasses of EmailConfig in net.proteusframework.email.config 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContentElementEmailConfig
      Email configuration for a template sent to users from a ContentElement like a Reset Password Component.
      class  NamedEmailConfig
      Email configuration base class that stores non-localized name and resource description.
      class  ProgrammaticEmailConfig
      Marks an EmailTemplate as being used by an application unknown to EmailTemplateManagement.
      class  UserManagementEmailConfig
      Email configuration for a template sent to users as part of user management.
